find_your_insider.title: Find Your Insider
find_your_insider.body: Get personailzed reccomendations & direct support by shopping with our Insider

i_know_an_insider.body: At a Pop Up or referred by an Insider you recognize? Find them here to get their recommendations and have your questions answered directly by them.
i_know_an_insider.help_link: Help Me Get Matched With An Insider
i_know_an_insider.input_placeholder: Enter Insider name or webiste URL

match_insider.body: Make your shopping experience more personal with a JAFRA Insider. Have your questions answered directly & shop their recommendations.
match_insider.help_link: I already have an Insider I want to shop with
match_insider.map_text: Use Location or Enter Zip To Find Insiders
match_insider.no_insiders_found: There are no insiders in your area.
match_insider.zip_error_msg: Please Enter A Valid Zip Code
